name: Fighting Arena
description: A large venue for organized combat sports and tournaments; adventurers can participate in fights, place bets on matches, or watch skilled warriors demonstrate their prowess.
atmosphere: The arena echoes with the clash of weapons and the roar of excited spectators. The air carries the scent of sweat, blood, and the metallic tang of combat. The sound of combat and the cheers of the crowd creates an electric atmosphere of violence, skill, and glory.
